grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 阻止【ソシ】obstruction, check, hindrance, prevention, impediment, interdiction, preemption, blocking
妊娠悪阻【ニンシンアソ】hyperemesis gravidarum, HG, severe morning sickness
悪阻【ツワリ】morning sickness, hyperemesis gravidarum
kun reading compounds: 阻む【はばむ】to keep someone from doing, to stop, to prevent, to check, to hinder, to obstruct, to oppose, to thwart
